title: 'Interrupt The Systems': Robin DiAngelo On 'White Fragility' And Anti-Racism
description: You may not think of yourself as racist, but Robin DiAngelo says that "nice white people" are still complicit in racist structures. DiAngelo has tips to help white people break from apathy, interrupt racist systems and commit to anti-racist practices.
